text: What’s the JCON proceedings paper deadline if one is playing with the idea to write up a juliacon presentation into a 5-10 pages paper? I can’t find this on the website, but most papers from last year were published during or just after the conference

attachments.title: JuliaCon 2021 Proceedings
attachments.text: Hi everyone, as indicated by the recent call for proposals here on discourse we are slowly approaching JuliaCon 2021. On behalf of the editorial board, it is my pleasure to announce that, for the third time in a row, there will be JuliaCon conference proceedings! For presenters at JuliaCon this means the opportunity to submit supplementary articles next to their talk or poster contributions which, after passing through an open peer-review process, will be published in our academic journal. Gen...
